```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
setwd("./data/")
patient_df <- tibble(filenames = list.files()) %>%
  mutate(weekly_data = map(filenames, read_csv)) %>%
  unnest() %>%
  mutate(arm = substring(filenames, 1, 3),
         subject_id  = substring(filenames, 5, 6)) %>%
  gather(week, measure, 2:9)
```
